title: Slowly Reclines
lyrics:
Oh, what a waste
You got two [?] and you left
It was boring
Hug from behind
Pleasure escapes the [?]
No game implied



Lucky girl needs are rarity

Smugly she sighs

Down ten pints of bitter as she reclines



Oh, twisted face

In a room that hides all the shame and disgrace

To place your best

Unwildly fashion while she does what's expects

No mind does rest



Lucky girl needs are rarity

Smugly she sighs

Down ten pints of bitter as she slowly reclines

Slowly reclines

Ooh-ah, ooh-ah
